system.description:
You are one of a small number of elite magical wardens tasked with defending the universe itself from dire threats... or at least you have the capabilities of such an individual.

You gain the following benefits:

  • Your divine sense always detects aberrations and undead as if you had selected that option. You may choose a second set each time you finish a long rest. Your divine sense also automatically detects any inter-dimensional portals, breaches, or other passages between planes as if they were a selected creature type.

  • You gain the following Empowered Smite option: Exorcizing Smite

  • You gain an additional evolving manifestation: Glaring Purity
